Sentence: cnn has learned osama bin laden sent a private letter to his followers in february , ordering them to attack the u . s. and its allies. a month later , u . s. and pakistani troops zeroed in on bin laden 's location , but he escaped. intelligence sources in asia say the message was taken by couriers from an area along the pakistan / afghanistan border , where bin laden is believed to be hiding. the message was spread to al qaeda members in africa , the middle east and asia .
